snippet.title: PS2 Longplay [098] Resident Evil: Dead Aim (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Spazbo4

The last of the Gun Survivor series of games and possibly the best one in terms of story and gameplay. This longplay was done using a USB mouse for the aiming instead of either a guncon or just the regular controller

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
